Key:
(Some time has passed since Miku and I started
dating. Miku's been skillfully balancing her work
and school.)

(In fact, strangely enough, ever since we started
dating, she's only shined brighter. Sure, I might
be biased, but it's undeniable.)

(Even so, it's still a grueling schedule.
Thinking that she needed a well-deserved break,
Miku and I decided to have a park date.)

Darling, hurry hurry～
Over here～

You're so spry, even though it's been a while
since you've had a day off.

Well, today's the day I can see you, after all.
All of my exhaustion just disappears.

(As Miku says this, she takes my hand. Lately,
we've been less shy about holding hands, too.
We're finally progressing as a couple.)

(There was still so much we had to learn
about one another, but with time, we'd be
able to fill in the blanks bit by bit.)

I feel like I've done a lot of embarrassing
stuff, but if I want her to know the real me,
I guess that's all part of it...

What's the matter, darling? You're spacing
out again. Is something wrong? Or has
something good happened...?

Well, we've been dating for a while now, right?
I was just thinking... that we're starting to
act more like a couple.

You're right. I've gotten to know who you are,
darling. So I think it's helped me be a better
girlfriend than before, too.
I've learned a lot about you too, Miku.

Eeheehee. Hey, darling? Is it okay for me to be
to your girlfriend for a while?

Of course that's okay. You'll always be my
girlfriend, Miku.

(Well, I guess that means Miku's going to be
leading me around for a while.)

Hee hee hee. Happy to hear it. I want to know
everything there is to know about you.

Of course, but there's so much I want to learn
about you too, Miku. Otherwise, it isn't fair,
right?
Aww. About me, too?

What do you mean? Of course. Come on,
I'll only be falling deeper and deeper in
love with you, Miku.

Now what are you saying, darling?! I'm the
one who's fallen deeper and deeper in love
with you!
Don't get me wrong... Is this a competition?
It is! Hmph!

(We're both pretty straightforward. Thinking
about it like this is pretty funny.)
Pff... Haha, hahaha!
Hee hee... Hehehe!
We're pretty similar, aren't we?
Yes! One in the same.

Oh, I know. I thought of something. Miku,
could I ask you a favor?
A favor for you, darling?

Hmm, I suppose it can't be helped. I'll do you
any favor whenever you ask, okay?
Any favor, huh? I got a good one.
(So, if you asked what happened next...)
D-D-D-darling...? Th-This is... a bit unorthodox.

I've been thinking about how I want to see
you sing and dance up close.

If that's what you want, then you can attend
one of my events or live concerts—
But you don't have one soon, right?

That's true, but I don't feel like there's
any need to watch this footage...
Come on, Miku. Once more, with feeling!

Oh goodness, darling! You'll pay for this
later!
Could it be that you're a little embarrassed?
Not just a little. This is very embarrassing!

Why? You're always standing on stage in
front of your fans.

That might be true, but... I feel as though
I'm laying myself bare to you, darling.

(I mean, I get it. It could be that performing
is just work, and she keeps her private life
separate.)

We've taken a bath together once, so there's
no reason to be embarrassed now.

Ooogh, that's true, but we're talking about
two completely different circumstances.

Come on, now. Keep dancing. In the video,
you're all smiles, Miku!

Goodness. You're such a meanie, darling. Aren't
you getting a little carried away?

Once in a while is fine, right?
Come on Miku, smile!
Good grief.
Haha. You're totally blushing.

You're being a meanie, darling. If you get too
carried away, I'll get angry!

Getting angry is fine. Doesn't matter if you're
embarrassed, angry, crying, or laughing...
I'll still love you!

Darling!
...Me too, darling. I'll always love you.
